dataList.content: Crea la tua Squadra
Puoi assemblare una Squadra dai tuoi 12 Peccatori e le loro Identità.
Squadra (Schermata Peccatori)
Nella schermata 'Peccatori' Selezionare il riquadro dell'Identità di un Peccatore mostrerà una lista delle loro Identità. Da lì, puoi scegliere un'identità da schierare.
Squadra (Prima del Combattimento)
Selezionare la parte superiore di un riquadro dell'Identità di un Peccatore mostrerà una lista delle sue Identità. Da lì, puoi selezionare un'Identità da schierare.
Selezionare la parte inferiore di un riquadro dell'Identità di un Peccatore schiererà un'Identità in battaglia.
Questo mostra il numero totale di Identità schierabili per questo combattimento.
Non potrai modificare la tua Squadra in alcuni combattimenti. In quei casi, selezionare un riquadro dell'Identità di un Peccatore schiererà quell'identità in battagia.
Squadra - Informazioni Identità
In tutti i menù di Squadra, puoi tenere premuta un riquadro dell'Identità per vedere informazioni dettagliate sull'Identità e gli E.G.O equipaggiati al momento dal Peccatore.
Seleziona Annunciatori per il Combattimento
Seleziona questo bottone per vedere la tua lista di Annunciatori.
Puoi scegliere quali annunciatori ti seguiranno in battaglia.
SQUADRE
Seleziona le parole chiave dalla lista per scegliere un nome per la Squadra.
Prepara fino a 20 Squadre qui.
Informazioni Squadra
Puoi vedere le informazioni seguenti qui: Tutti i Tipi di Attacco delle Identità, Affinità Peccato, ed E.G.O equipaggiati
Risorse E.G.O
Qui, puoi vedere i tipi e quantità di Costi di E.G.O che la tua squadra può accumulare combattendo.
Selezionala, e potrai vedere le Identità che forniscono quei Costi e quali E.G.O li spendono.
Lista di E.G.O e Identità
Lista Identità
Lista E.G.O
Le Identità dei Peccatori sono mostrate qui. Puoi vedere la loro Rarità, Grado Legame, Livello, e Fazioni.
Configurazione Squadra
Puoi vedere sia le Identità che E.G.O selezionati per la tua squadra qui. Un E.G.O può essere registrato per ogni grado.
Configurazione Squadra
Premere questo bottone ti porta alla lista di E.G.O che si possono equipaggiare nella sezione.
Puoi visualizzare il grado dell'E.G.O, Grado Intreccio, attributo principale, e nome.
Lista Supporti
Bottone Supporti
Selezionandolo, viene mostrata una lista delle Identità di supporto dei tuoi amici.
Le Identità di Supporto e gli E.G.O registrati dagli amici sono mostrati qui.
Puoi prendere in prestito l'Identità di un amico e E.G.O per aiutarti. Nota bene che puoi avere nella tua squadra una sola Identità di Supporto alla volta.
Informazioni Identità
Livello
Livellare un'Identità aumenta le sue statistiche.
Grado Legame
Gradi Legame più alti miglioreranno le abilità già esistenti o sbloccheranno nuove Abilità.
Stato
Qui sono visualizzate i PV Massimi, Gamma di Velocità, Livello Difensivo ed il suo modificatore.
Resistenze
Le Resistenze dell'Identità sono mostrate qui.
Riassunto delle Identità
Gli E.G.O equipaggiati e Abilità sbloccate dell'Identità sono mostrati qui.
Abilità
Ogni Identità ha Abilità con varie funzioni. Puoi vedere i loro dettagli qui.
Le Identità schierate in battaglia possono attivare le loro Passive. All'inizio di ogni turno, le Passive si attivanno quando le loro condizioni sono raggiunte.
Le Identità non schierate in battaglia possono attivare le loro Passive di Supporto. All'inizio di ogni turno, le Passive di Supporto si attiveranno quando le loro condizioni sono raggiunte.
Icone delle Abilità
Il colore di ogni Icona Abilità corrisponde ad un' Affinità Peccato dello stesso colore. Le Affinità Peccato sono le seguenti: Ira, Lussuria, Accidia, Gola, Tristezza, Superbia, Invidia.
In fondo all'Icona Abilità si trova il suo Tipo di Attacco. I tipi sono i seguenti: Tagliente, Perforante, Contundente.
Alla sinistra dell'Icona Abilità si trova il suo Valore Base.
Sopra un'Icona Abilità sta il suo Potere Moneta. Questi sono i tipi di calcoli per il Potere Moneta: Più, Meno, e Moltiplicazione.
Il numero di Monete di questa Abilità è qui.
Questo indica quante copie di un'Abilità sono a disposizione dell'Identità.

Il Livello Offensivo dell'Abilità ed il suo modificatore sono mostrate qui. La differenza tra il Livello Offensivo dell'Attacco e il Livello Difensivo del bersaglio può influenzare enormemente la quantità di danni inflitti.
Il Peso Attacco dell'Abilità è mostrato qui. Un Peso Attacco più alto colpirà più nemici. (es. 1 Pezo Att colpirà un nemico, 3 Peso Att colpirà 3 nemici)
Effetti Abilità
Le Abilità potrebbero avere degli effetti che si attivano quando le condizioni indicate si avverano.
Effetti delle Monete

Le Abilità potrebbero avere effetti che si attivano quando le condizioni delle Monete indicate(es. Testa Colpisce, Croce Colpisce) si avverano. Gli effetti delle Monete non si attiveranno quando le condizioni non si avverano.
Informazioni sugli E.G.O
Grado Intreccio
Livello più alti di Intreccio miglioreranno le Abilità e effetti degli E.G.O.
Resistenze
Le Resistenze dell' E.G.O sono mostrate qui. Se un'Identità ha usato un'Abilità E.G.O, le sue Resistenze saranno rimpiazzate dalle Resistenze dell'E.G.O usato.
Costo in Sanità
La quantità di PS spesi usando questa Abilità E.G.O è mostrata qui.
Costo in Risorse dell'E.G.O
Le risorse E.G.O richieste per usare questa Abilità E.G.O sono mostrate qui.
Abilità E.G.O
Le Abilità E.G.O hanno Potere Base/Moneta alti e Effetti potenti. I dettagli delle Abilità E.G.O sono mostrati qui.

Se un' Identità con PS bassi usa un'Abilità E.G.O, c'è una probabilità che al suo posto sia usata una potente Abilità Corrosione E.G.O. Solo che usare un'Abilità Corrosione E.G.O comporta un rischio, dato che attacca indiscriminatamente e potrebbe mirare anche agli alleati.

Puoi attivare forzatamente un' Abilità Corrosione E.G.O al costo di 1.5 volte la quantità di Risorse e PS rispetto al normale. Questo si chiame Overclock dell' E.G.O.
L'Overclock dell'E.G.O si può attivare tenendo premuta la Carta dell'E.G.O nel menù di selezione Abilità E.G.O durante il combattimento.
Un' Abilità Overclock E.G.O Stabile verrà attivata se sono disponibili abbastanza Costi E.G.O (1.5 volte i soliti). Le Abilità Overclock E.G.O Stabile distinguono tra alleati e nemici.
Se i Costi E.G.O disponibili non sono sufficenti, un'Abilità Overclock E.G.O Instabile sarà attivata al suo posto. L' Abilità Overclock E.G.O Instabile non distingue gli alleati dai nemici.
Usare un'Abilità E.G.O attiverà la sua Passiva.
Icone Abilità
Il colore di ogni Icona Abilità corrisponde ad un'Affinità Peccato dello stesso colore. Le Affinità Peccato sono le seguenti: Ira, Lussuria, Accidia, Gola, Tristezza, Superbia, Invidia.
In fondo ad un'Icona Abilità si trova il suo Tipo di Attacco. I Tipi di Attacco sono i seguenti: Tagliente, Penetrante, e Contundende.
Alla sinistra di un'Icona Abilità si trova il suo Potere di Base.
In cima all' Icona Abilità si trova il suo Potere Moneta. I tipi di calcolo del Potere Moneta sono i seguenti: Più, Meno e Moltiplicazione.
Il numero di Monete di questa Abilità è visualizzato qui.

Il Livello Offensivo dell'Abilità ed il suo modificatore sono mostrate qui. La differenza tra il Livello Offensivo dell'Attacco e il Livello Difensivo del bersaglio può influenzare enormemente la quantità di danni inflitti.
Il Peso Attacco dell'Abilità è mostrato qui. Un Peso Attacco più alto colpirà più nemici. (es. 1 Pezo Att colpirà un nemico, 3 Peso Att colpirà 3 nemici)
Effetti Abilità
Le Abilità potrebbero avere degli effetti che si attivano quando le condizioni indicate si avverano.
Effetti delle Monete

Le Abilità potrebbero avere effetti che si attivano quando le condizioni delle Monete indicate(es. Testa Colpisce, Croce Colpisce) si avverano. Gli effetti delle Monete non si attiveranno quando le condizioni non si avverano.
La Storia Principale
Selezione Canto
Puoi vedere parti della storia passata qui. Seleziona un Canto.
Elenco delle Scene
Scegli la scena che vorresti vedere.
Posizione nella Storia
Puoi vedere anche in quale sezione la scena si è svolta per la prima volta.
Storie delle Identità
Seleziona un Peccatore
Puoi leggere i profili e le storie dei Peccatori. Seleziona un Peccatore.
Selezionare Identità
Puoi selezionare dalla lista di Identità del Peccatore.
Storia Identità
Puoi leggere la storia dell'Identità qui.
Frasi con Voce
Puoi vedere le frasi dette dall'Identità o la sua storia.
Mondi Specchio
Mondi Specchio
Una volta selezionati, verrà mostrata la lista di Mondi Specchio.
Organizzazione
Nei Mondi Specchio, le varie storie delle Identità sono raccolte in base al riflesso da cui vengono. Puoi vedere ogni Mondo Specchio e le sue fazioni.
Storie dallo Specchio
Leggi ogni storia delle Identità in base al Mondo Specchio.
Sezioni Principali
Sezione
Scegli in quale sezione entrare.
Dopo aver vinto il combattimento, la sezione sarà segnata come completata.
Se completi gli Obiettivi EX, guadagnerai ricompense bonus, e la sezione sarà segnata di conseguenza.
Storia della Sezione
Puoi anche rivedere le scene viste in questa sezione.
Descrizione Sezione
Puoi vedere una sinossi e descrizione della sezione qui.
Informazioni sui Nemici
Puoi leggere dei nemici che appariranno. Le informazioni su alcuni nemici potenti saranno disponibili solo dopo averli incontrati.
Obiettivi EX
Gli Obiettivi EX sono mostrati qui.
Entrare in una Sezione
Entrare nelle sezioni con combattimento costa Encefalina.
Limite di Partecipanti
Ogni sezione ha un limite al numero di partecipanti.
Dungeon della Storia
Finestra di Informazioni sul Dungeon
Un dungeon ti aspetta alla fine di ogni episodio. Entrare nei dungeon costa Moduli di Encefalina.
Esplorazione dei Dungeon
Puoi procedere spostandoti agli spazi adiacenti alla tua postazione. Incontrerai vari nemici e anche eventi con conseguenze.
Salute dei Peccatori
I PV, PS e morti dei Peccatori saranno mantenuti tra un'incontro e l'altro.
Checkpoint
Quando raggiungi un checkpoint, i tuoi Peccatori verranno completamente curati.
Doni E.G.O
Esplorando il dungeon, potresti ottenere Doni E.G.O; questo oggetti offrono degli effetti potenti che rimarranno fino alla fine dell'esplorazione.
Scendere tra Piani
Un dungeon consiste di vari piani. Potrai procedere dopo aver preso la zona intorno alle scale.
Dungeon Specchio
Lista dei Dungeon Specchio
Puoi scegliere uno dei vari Dungeon Specchio dove entrare. Ricevere i Premi del Dungon Specchio costa Moduli di Encefalina.
Compendio dei Doni E.G.O
Puoi vedere la lista dei Doni E.G.O che appaiono nel Dungeon Specchio. Certi Doni E.G.O devono essere sbloccati raggiungendo condizioni specifiche.
Doni E.G.O Iniziali
Quando entri in un Dungeon Specchio, ti verrà offerta una selezione casuale di Doni E.G.O per aiutare nell'esplorazione. Scegline una da portare dentro.
Selezionare i Peccatori
Crea una squadra di tre peccatori che devono svolgere lesplorazione.
Selezionare le Identità
Seleziona le Identità per i Peccatori. Nei Dungeon Specchio, tutte le Identità partono dal Livello 10, e possono salire di livello procedendo.
Selezionare gli E.G.O
Scegli gli E.G.O da equipaggiare per i tuoi Peccatori. Puoi solo selezionare E.G,.O di grado ZAYIN durante lo schieramento.
Esplorare il Dungeon Specchio

La struttura e le strade nel Dungeon Specchio sono generati casualmente ogni volta che entri. Procedi spostandoti ad uno degli spazi adiancenti nel prossimo settore, e supera gli incontri e eventi che ti aspettano.
Doni E.G.O
Mentre esplori il dungeon, potresti  acquisire dei Doni E.G.O; questi oggetti offrono degli effetti potenti che rimangono fino alla fine dell'esplorazione.
Salute dei Peccatori
I PV, PS e morti dei Peccatori saranno mantenuti tra un'incontro e l'altro.
Selezionare i Peccatori
Alcuni eventi ti permetteranno di aggiungere più Peccatori alla tua squadra.
Potenziarsi
Nel Dungeon Specchio, le Identità si potenziano gradualmente mentre procedi. Livellale e equipaggia più E.G.O grazie ad alcuni combattimenti e eventi.
Ricompense del Dungeon Specchio
Otterrai una ricompensa una volta completato il dunngeon, e verrà aggiunto un bonus un numero preciso di volte ogni settimana. La quantità di ricompense è proporzionata al numero di nodi superati.
Estrazioni
Categorie
Puoi scegliere tra Estrazioni Standard ed Estrazioni Mirate.
Estrazione
Puoi spendere Follia per estrarre Identità o E.G.O.
Periodo di Mira
Puoi vedere quando durerà il banner di Estrazione limitata.
Obiettivo Incluso
Puoi vedere dettagli sull'Identità o E.G.O inclusi qui.
Cronologia Estrazione
Puoi vedere il registro delle estrazioni precedenti qui.
Informazioni Probabilità
Puoi vedere la probabilità che l'Identità o E.G.O inclusi vengano estratti.
ScheggieEgo
Quando ottieni un'Identità che possiedi già, riceverai delle ScheggieEgo in base alla rarità.
Dispensa
Catalogo della Dispensa
Puoi scambiare ScheggieEgo per Identità o E.G.O che non possiedi già.
Tipi nella Dispensa
Puoi comprare Identità e E.G.O disponibili in modo permanente, e in più quelle di stagioni passate.
Scegliere Cose da Comprare
Per comprare un' Identità o E.G.O da qui, ti serviranno delle ScheggieEgo del Peccatore.
Scambio Filo
Le ScheggieEgo si possono anche scambiare per del Filo.
Filo
Il filo può essere usato per Legare le Identità e intrecciare l'E.G.O.
Informazioni Manager
Informazioni Utente
Qui puoi vedere le tue informazioni come utente, lista di personaggi di supporto, e la tua lista di amici.
Informazioni Utente
L'ID Utente (UID) e livello dell'account sono visualizzati qui.
Banner
Puoi configurare i tuoi banner decorativi.
Volto della Compagnia
Puoi scegliere un'illustrazione dei Peccatori da mostrare tra quelle che possiedi.
Lista Illustrazioni
Puoi vedere le illustrazioni delle Identità e E.G.O che possiedi.
Presentazione
Usa una combinazione delle frasi e parole che ti vengono date per presentarti.
Creare una presentazione
Scegli da una lista di frasi e parole prefatte per la tua presentazione.
Company
Identità di Supporto
Puoi assegnare Identità e E.G.O di supporto per aiutare gli altri.
Amici
Lista Amici
Puoi vedere gli ID, banner, presentazioni, e tempo di accesso più recente dei tuoi amici; inoltre, aggiungere utenti come amici!
Battle Pass
Ricompense del Battle Pass
Puoi vedere e raccogliere ricompense per i livelli del battle pass gratuito e del Limbus Pass.
Periodo del Pass e Nome
Puoi vedere il titolo del battle pass e il periodo.
Livello del Pass e Progressi
Puoi vedere il livello del tuo battle pass e i tuoi progressi qui.
Missioni del Battle Pass
Questa è la lista di missioni che ti daranno progressi nel battle pass quando vengono completate. Ci sono missioni giornaliere, settimanali, e stagionali.
Ricompense per Livello Massimo
Once you've reached the maximum level for determined rewards on the battle pass, you will be given bonus rewards with each level up. Limbus Pass owners gain additional rewards.
Scavoluce ESP
Lista di Siti per Scavoluce
Scegli in quale sezione entrare in base alla forza dei tuoi Peccatori. Entrare nelle sezioni di Scavoluce costa Moduli di Encefalina.
Affinità Utili
I nemici in Scavoluce ESP hanno resistenze specifiche. Puoi vedere il tipo e Affinità che saranno più efficaci per ogni sezione prima di entrare.
Ricompense dello Scavoluce ESP
In Scavoluce ESP, puoi acquisire esperienza dal combattimento e Biglietti per Addestramento Identità, e puoi guadagnare ricompense bonus per un numero fisso di vittorie al giorno.
Scavoluce Filo
Lista di Siti per Scavoluce
Include sezioni di combattimento con Anormalità diverse a seconda del giorno della settimana. Entrare nelle sezioni di Scavoluce costa Moduli di Encefalina.
Affinità Utili
I nemici in Scavoluce Filo hanno resistenze specifiche. Puoi vedere il tipo e Affinità che saranno più efficaci per ogni sezione prima di entrare.
Seleziona il Livello
Scegli in quale sezione entrare in base alla forza dei tuoi Peccatori.
Ricompense dello Scavoluce Filo
Nello Scavoluce Filo, puoi acquisire Filo, e puoi guadagnare ricompense bonus per un numero fissso di vittorie al giorno.
Metro Rifrattive
Apertura della Metro Rifrattiva

Le Tratte della Metro Rifrattiva saranno aperte per un certo periodo di tempo.
Puoi entrare nelle Tratte disponibili senza costi.
Periodo di Apertura
Il tempo di apertura della Metro è visualizzato accanto alla Tratta.
You will choose a number of Identità e E.G.O to begin the expedition with.
Unlike other combat-based content, the level-ups and tier-ups done to your Identità e E.G.O while an expedition is in progress will not be immediately reflected on your team's status.

You may not change your team in the middle of an expedition. 
If you wish to modify your setup or reflect upgrades on your Identità e E.G.O, you must start a new expedition.
Refraction Railway Main Screen
The Refraction Railway consists of 13 stages.
Encounter
Every battle in the Refraction Railway will allow you to directly match ally skills against enemy skills, similar to Focused Encounters.
Current E.G.O Resources
The E.G.O resources held after clearing a stage can be carried over to the next stage.
Sinner Status
The HP, SP, and availability of your Identità are shown here.
Clear Turns & Total Turns

When you clear a stage, the Station will record the number of turns taken to beat it: Clear Turns.
As well as the cumulative number of turns taken throughout the current expedition: Total Turns.
Sinner Status
The HP, SP, and availability of your Identità are shown here.
Banner Requisites
You can check the requirements for acquiring banners here.
You can acquire more lavishly ornamented banners as you meet more difficult conditions.
The Lost & Found
After clearing a stage in the Line for the first time during the event period, the rewards will be sent to the Lost & Found.

After clearing a stage in the Line for the first time during the event period, the rewards will be sent to the Lost & Found.
To gain access to the Lost & Found, a number of Moduli di Encefalina will be required.
Afterward, you may freely access it and claim the rewards you've earned at no additional cost.
Total Record

Upon clearing the final stage, the records for the expedition will be saved.
Records of up to 20 expeditions are kept in the logs.
If more than 20 records are in the log, the ones with the highest Total Turns will be removed first; if the Total Turns are the same, then the death count acts as the next criterion.
If the death counts are identical as well, the older record will be removed.
Resting

The Health and Sanity of your Sinners will carry over between stages.
However, after clearing a stage, those who did not participate in the battle will fully recover their HP and SP when entering the next stage.
Any Sanities above 0 will be maintained in either case.
Breaking Records

During an expedition, you can choose to start over from previously cleared Stations.
When you do so, the battle will start with the Sinners' statuses and E.G.O resources reverted to that point, and any progress you've made since that Station will be reset.
The Railway's Special Decorative Banners
When a Line of the Refraction Railway closes, the best total turn record will be etched on the lower side of that Line's banner.
Hell's Chicken
Unlocking Hell's Chicken

The [Hell's Chicken Event Page] opens after clearing Sezione 3-22 of the Main Story.
You may enter the event page via the banner on the Window or the Driverside.
Event Period
The duration of the Hell's Chicken event is shown here. During the event, you can earn [Bongy Plushies] by clearing Sezioni and Dungeons in the event and Main Story.
※ Dungeon Specchio, Luxcavation, and the Refraction Railway do not give [Bongy Plushies].
Event Sezioni

Hell's Chicken consists of 8 stages and 2 dungeons.
Said stages and dungeons also offer batches of [Bongy Plushies] as a first-time EX Clear bonus.
You can earn considerably more [Bongy Plushies] from Hell's Chicken Dungeons compared to regular stages.
Event Bonus Units
Having Identità e E.G.O from the Hell's Chicken event on your team increases the amount of [Bongy Plushies] earned from stages and dungeons.
Coupon Trade-in
You can redeem various rewards from the [Coupon Trade-in] based on the number of [Bongy Plushies] you have.
Coupon Trade-in
You can acquire event reward Identità e E.G.O, as well as various currencies from the [Coupon Trade-in].
The [Coupon Trade-in]'s open duration is shown here.
Event Dungeons

Hell's Chicken Dungeons play similarly to Dungeon Specchio.
The dungeons come in two difficulties; their major traits are as follows.
Selezionare Doni E.G.O

Several Doni E.G.O from the Dungeon Specchio will appear in the Hell's Chicken Dungeon.
These Doni E.G.O will assist event Identità e E.G.O to shine in their respective specialties.
Event Team Setup
In the Hell's Chicken dungeons, you begin expeditions with 5 Identità.
Presets

For player convenience, a preset function is being added for the Hell's Chicken dungeons.
Using the preset button, you can quickly load the team setup you last used and make a swift entry.
Dungeon Structure

The layouts and paths in the Hell's Chicken dungeons are randomly generated each time you enter.
These dungeons consist of a single floor, and the final node always features the Hell's Chicken boss.
Exclusive Encounters

There are special encounters and Doni E.G.O unique to the Hell's Chicken dungeons.
These specialties are marked with a unique icon below the node in the dungeon for easier identification.
Event Closure
Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the Hell's Chicken combat encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside - [Deviazione] and Theater - [Detour Tales].
Seasons Guide
Season Duration

When a new season begins, a new Battle Pass is introduced with it.
You can check the duration of the current season on the Battle Pass page.
Battle Pass Rewards
You can obtain currencies for the current season as well as E.G.O from the Battle Pass.
Season Info for Identità & E.G.O

You can check the season an Identity or E.G.O belongs to below its name in the info tab.
Those without a season shown are categorized into the [Regular] tag.
Season Info for Event Identità & E.G.O
Event Identità e E.G.O have [EVENT] marked next to their season tag.
ScheggieEgo

ScheggieEgo can be used for the notated period, matching the Season's duration.

When a new Season begins, half of the previous Season's ScheggieEgo will be carried over, converted and rounded up for the new Season.

The carryover rates for unconverted ScheggieEgo from multiple seasons past will be halved for each following Season.

The remaining ScheggieEgo are converted into Thread.
Egoshard Crates

Similarly to ScheggieEgo, Egoshard Crates can be used for the notated period, matching the Season's duration.

When a new Season begins, half of the Egoshard Crates (both random & nominable) will be carried over, converted and rounded up for the new Season.

The carryover rates for unconverted Egoshard Crates from multiple Seasons past will be halved for each following Season.

The remaining Crates are converted into Thread Crates.
Extractions

A new Season's Identità e E.G.O will be added to the list of Extractable items.
Identità from previous Seasons remain in the pool, so you can still acquire them from Extraction.
※ Event Identità & E.G.O from previous Seasons may appear from Sinner Target Extractions. (except reward Identità & E.G.O from the immediately preceding Season)
Dispenser

Identità e E.G.O from the new Season will become available at the Dispenser.
In addition, you will be able to exchange for Identità e E.G.O from the Battle Passes of past Seasons.
Please note that Extraction IDs belonging to the Season immediately before will be inaccessible until 2 Seasons have passed.
Dungeon Specchio
Dungeon Specchio List

You can choose a Dungeon Specchio from the list to enter.
Only one expedition can be carried out at a time; if you want to enter a different Dungeon Specchio while an expedition is in progress, you need to clear or forfeit the ongoing expedition first.
Each Dungeon Specchio (excluding Mirror of the Beginning) has two difficulty modes: Normal and Hard.
Weekly Bonuses
Every week, you're given 3 Weekly Bonus eligibilities that grant you additional rewards for Dungeon Specchio expeditions when used.
Unlock Requirements
Each Dungeon Specchio has requirements you need to meet to unlock.
Dono E.G.O Compendium

You can check the list of Doni E.G.O that appear in Dungeon Specchio.
The ones you haven't obtained yet in Dungeon Specchio expeditions will be marked with "No Data".
Starting Dono E.G.O
When you enter a Dungeon Specchio, you'll be offered a random selection of Doni E.G.O to help the exploration. Choose one to take with you.
Selezionare Sinners

You will select a team of Sinners to enter the Dungeon Specchio with.
Each Dungeon Specchio has its own size limit for the starting team.
Doni E.G.O Owned
You can view the Doni E.G.O you currently have.
Presets
By using presets, you can load up Identity and E.G.O Teams you have set up in the 'Sinners' window.
Cost

You can view the Cost in your possession here.
Cost is used when purchasing Doni E.G.O from the shop, or when acquiring new Identità o E.G.O to have on your team at the shop or the rest stop.
On Normal difficulty, you are not given any starting Cost, but the initial team setup doesn't require any Cost.
On Hard difficulty, you're given a set amount of Cost to build your initial team with.
Selezionare Identità

Select Identità for the Sinners.
In Dungeon Specchio, all Identità are set at the level appropriate for the Dungeon.
Selezionare E.G.O
Choose E.G.O to use for the selected Sinner.
Entering the Dungeon Specchio
After finishing up the initial team setup, press 'Confirm' to enter the Dungeon Specchio.
Exploring Dungeon Specchio

The layouts and paths in Dungeon Specchio are randomly generated each time you enter.
Proceed by moving to one of the adjacent spaces in the next sector, and deal with the encounters and events waiting for you.
Doni E.G.O

As you explore the dungeon, you may acquire Doni E.G.O.
These items offer powerful effects that last until the end of the exploration.
Sinner Health
The HP, SP, and lost lives of your Sinners will carry over between encounters.
Effective Attacks
Below the combat encounter nodes in Dungeon Specchio, types and affinities effective against the enemies will be shown.
Rest Stops
In Dungeon Specchio, there are Rest Stops where you may heal up for free, or spend Cost to gain an Identity or E.G.O to deploy on the team.
Shops
At Shops, you can purchase Doni E.G.O, heal allies, recruit Identità o E.G.O, or power up selected allies using the Cost you earned from combat encounters.
Dungeon Specchio Rewards

After clearing an expedition, you can spend Moduli di Encefalina to claim rewards.
If you use the Weekly Bonus Eligibility count, you can earn large amounts of Battle Pass XP and some Lunacy.
The amount of rewards depends on the number of nodes cleared.
Hard Difficulty Rewards

Once the Hard difficulty of a Dungeon Specchio is unlocked, the Hard difficulty rewards count will be displayed above.
On Hard difficulty, you can earn more Battle Pass XP, but you may only claim the rewards 3 times per week.
The Hard difficulty rewards bonus and the weekly bonus apply independently; you can maximize your rewards by applying the weekly bonus to the Hard difficulty rewards.
Starter Buffs
Mirror of Mirrors and the Dungeon Specchio after it have starter buffs you can activate.
Starter Buff Effects

Starter buffs can be activated using 'Starlight', providing various effects to aid your Dungeon Specchio expedition.
Starlight can be earned by playing Dungeon Specchio. Reaching further floors rewards more.
Starter buffs apply to both the Normal and Hard difficulties, but it does not affect other Dungeon Specchio.
You cannot use the Starlight from a Dungeon Specchio to activate starter buffs for other Dungeon Specchio.
S.E.A.
Unlocking S.E.A

[S.E.A Event Page] opens after clearing Sezione 4-54 of the Main Story.
You may enter the event page via the banner on the Window or the Driverside.
Event Period
The duration of the S.E.A event is shown here. During the event, you can earn [Bus-modifying Scrap] by clearing Sezioni and Dungeons in the event and Main Story.
※ Dungeon Specchio and Scavoluce do not give [Bus-modifying Scrap].
Event Sezioni

S.E.A consists of 12 stages, including story stages.
Said stages also offer batches of [Bus-modifying Scrap] as a first-time EX Clear bonus.
You can earn considerably more [Bus-modifying Scrap] from S.E.A stages compared to Main Story stages.
Event Bonus Units
Having Identità e E.G.O from S.E.A event on your team increases the amount of [Bus-modifying Scrap] earned from stages and dungeons.
Scrap Box
You can redeem various rewards from the [Scrap Box] based on the number of [Bus-modifying Scrap] you have.
Scrap Box
You can acquire event reward Identità e E.G.O, as well as various currencies from the [Scrap Box].
The [Scrap Box]'s open duration is shown here.
Event Sezioni
S.E.A does not feature a dungeon; instead, there's a special stage where you can earn larger amounts of [Bus-modifying Scrap].
The special stage costs Moduli di Encefalina to enter.
Rare Horseshoe with Bus-modifying Scrap

After winning a battle, you have a small chance to find [Rare Horseshoe with Bus-modifying Scrap].
The [Rare Horseshoe with Bus-modifying Scrap] is automatically converted to 20 [Bus-modifying Scrap].
Event Closure
Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience combat encounters in S.E.A and view its story anytime at the Driverside - [Deviazione] and Theater - [Detour Tales].
How to Enter
Refraction Railway 2 does not consume resources to play. Select a Line to enter.
Team
You will choose a number of Identità e E.G.O to begin the expedition with.

You cannot change your loadout while the expedition is in progress. Unlike other combat-based content, the level-ups and tier-ups done to your Identità e E.G.O while an expedition is in progress will not be immediately reflected on your team's status.
Line 2 Stations
Refraction Railway Line 2 consists of 9 Stations.
Select the Station to enter.
Rewards for clearing this Station are displayed below. Some Stations' rewards will unlock only after meeting certain Cycle Count conditions.
Team Setup
You can select up to 7 participants for an encounter. While you can select less than 7 combat participants, no additional Skill slots will be given for them throughout the encounter.
Encounter
Every battle in the Refraction Railway will allow you to directly match ally skills against enemy skills, just like in Focused Encounters.
Upon completion, your Identità' HP, SP, Skills in the Dashboard, used Skills, and remaining Skills are saved.
The E.G.O resources held after clearing a Station can be carried over to the next Station.
Your Cycle Count and Total Turns up to this Station are displayed here.
The HP, SP, and availability of your Identità are shown here.

Upon entering the next Station, information saved in the last Station will be loaded.
The Speed of allies & enemies are saved upon entering a Station.
The Speed of allies & enemies are saved upon entering a Station.

Upon forfeiting a Sezione, you will be returned to the state immediately before entering this stage.
Identità' HP, SP, Speed, Skills in the Dashboard, used Skills, remaining Skills, and enemy Speed at the state immediately before entering the Station will not be changed.
Identità' HP, SP, Speed, Skills in the Dashboard, used Skills, remaining Skills, and enemy Speed at the state immediately before entering the Station will not be changed.
Upon defeat, you can either return to the state immediately before entering that Station or continue using your surviving Identità.
Should you choose to continue, enemies' current HP will be saved. Their remaining HP percentages will be shown above the Station.
Cycle
After clearing all open Stations on the Line, you can return to Station #1(First Stop) and continue the Cycle.
Should you choose to continue the Cycle, you will gain 1 Cycle Count. Some Stations will open only after reaching certain Cycle Counts.
Select Buffs
At the end of every Cycle, you can choose 1 Ally Buff and 1 Enemy Buff.
All selected Buffs will carry over to the coming encounters.
Select 1 Ally Buff. You cannot select the same Buff you selected in the last Cycle.

Select 1 Enemy Buff. You cannot select the same Buff you selected in the last Cycle.
However, if all Buffs had been selected at least once, selection limits will reset and you can select any Buff you want again.
Aside from the Buffs you select, every Cycle also gives 1 fixed Buff.
Every 5 Cycles, you will have a chance to revive one of your dead allied Identità.
The Terminus
If you have completed a Cycle (If you have 1 or more Cycle Counts), the Terminus in the middle of this Line will be activated.
Once the Terminus is activated, you can access it from any Station.
You cannot go back to the previous Station once you enter the Terminus. Choose carefully.
The ultimate goal of Refraction Railway Line 2 is to complete the Terminus. Upon completion, your Cycle Count, Total Turns, participating Identità & E.G.O, and selected Buffs will be recorded.
Banner Requisites
You can check the requirements for acquiring banners here.

More special banners have harder acquisition conditions.
Upon acquisition of the banner, your best Cycle Count and Total Turn records will be displayed on them.
Upon acquisition of the banner, your best Cycle Count and Total Turn records will be displayed on them.
Lost & Found
After clearing a stage in the Line for the first time or meeting a certain condition, the rewards will be sent to the Lost & Found.

To gain access to a reward for the first time at Lost & Found, a number of Moduli di Encefalina will be required.
Afterward, you may freely access it and claim rewards you've earned at no additional cost.
Total Record
Upon clearing the final stage, your Refraction Railway play record will be saved. Up to 20 records can be viewed.

When you have made more than 20 records, records with the least Cycle Count will be deleted first. If there are two lowest records with the same Cycle Count, the one with a higher Total Turn Count will be deleted.
Alter Line Button
Upon clearing all open Stations on the Line, a button to continue to the next Line will appear.
Cycle
You can take the Line to return to Station #1(First Stop).
In this process, you will gain 1 Cycle Count, and be asked to select 1 Ally Buff and 1 Enemy Buff that will be applied to the upcoming encounters.
Select Buffs
At the end of every Cycle, you can choose 1 Ally Buff and 1 Enemy Buff.
All selected Buffs will carry over to the coming encounters.
Select 1 Ally Buff. You cannot select the same Buff you selected in the last Cycle.

Select 1 Enemy Buff. You cannot select the same Buff you selected in the last Cycle.
However, if all Buffs had been selected at least once, selection limits will reset and you can select any Buff you want again.
Aside from the Buffs you select, every Cycle also gives 1 fixed Buff.
Button to the Terminus
Once you've selected your Buffs, take the Line to Station #1(First Stop). Some Stations will open only after reaching certain Cycle Counts.
After completing a Cycle, the Terminus in the middle of the Line will be activated. A button to enter the Terminus will also be activated.
You cannot go back to the previous Station once you enter the Terminus. Choose carefully.
The ultimate goal of Refraction Railway Line 2 is to complete the Terminus. Upon completion, your Cycle Count, Total Turns, participating Identità & E.G.O, and selected Buffs will be recorded.
Refraction Railway Line 2
Button to the Terminus
Only 3 Stations will be open upon entry. Growing your Cycle Count will sequentially open the subsequent Stations (Station #4 ~ #8).
Walpurgis Night
Walpurgis Night Target Extractions will be available during the event period.
Walpurgis Night Target Extractions will have higher Extraction rates for Identità e E.G.O from the currently active Walpurgis Night event.

During the event period, Identità & E.G.O from the current Walpurgis Night event will be Extractable from other Extraction banners(save for Season relevant Extraction banners) as well.

However, their extraction rates will be identical to those of other Identità & E.G.O.

During the event period, previous Walpurgis Night Identità & E.G.O will be Extractable from all Extraction banners(save for Season relevant Extraction banners).

However, they will not receive increased rates for those Extractions.
Once the event period is over, Walpurgis Night Identità e E.G.O will no longer be Extractable.
Walpurgis Night
During the event period, Identità e E.G.O from all previous Walpurgis Night events are available from the Dispenser.
Identità e E.G.O from the currently active Walpurgis Night event are not available from the Dispenser.
Mirror of the Lake
Season 3's Dungeon Specchio is called 'Mirror of the Lake'.
Choose between 'Normal' and 'Hard' difficulties to enter.
Weekly Bonuses
Every week, Dungeon Specchio offer Weekly Bonuses. Use Weekly Bonuses when you're claiming the rewards for the run—and receive greatly increased rewards.
'Normal' difficulty offers 3 Weekly Bonuses, and 'Hard' difficulty offers 1 Weekly Bonus.
Clearing the 'Hard' Difficulty Dungeon Specchio will allow you to spend the rest of the Normal Difficulty Weekly Bonuses as well, maximizing the amount of rewards you gain from the Dungeon Specchio.
Sinners
You can view your currently deployed Sinners here.
Starter Buffs
Collect Starlight from completing Dungeon Specchio and use them to obtain several Starter Buffs that will help you in the Dungeon Specchio.
Dono E.G.O Compendium
You can view the list of Doni E.G.O that appear in the Dungeon Specchio. Obtaining an Dono E.G.O in the Dungeon Specchio will add an entry to your Dono E.G.O Compendium.
Starter Buffs
In Mirror of the Lake, you can increase your chances of obtaining higher Tier Doni E.G.O during your Dungeon Specchio run by activating more Starter Buffs.
Starter Buffs do not change with the Dungeon Specchio difficulties.
Starlight
You can obtain Starlight from completing Dungeon Specchio runs.
The higher you rise through the Dungeon Specchio floors, the more Starlight you will obtain.
Starting Dono E.G.O Choice
Upon Dungeon Specchio entry, you will be given 8 Dono E.G.O categories to choose from.
You can choose as many Doni E.G.O as it is available to you from the same category.
Doni E.G.O provide special effects in the Dungeon Specchio to assist you in your journey.
You can obtain extra Starlight by choosing an Dono E.G.O category that you did not use in your immediately preceding run.
Forming the Team
Select Sinners who will participate in the Dungeon Specchio run.
In the Dungeon Specchio deployment stage, all Identity Levels will be fixed to 40. In 'Hard' difficulty, your current Identity levels will be reflected instead.
Deploy 1★ or 2★ Identità to gain additional Cost upon entry.
Deploy Identità that have not been used in your immediately preceding Run to gain additional Cost upon entry.
Rest Bonus
The deployed Identity's Rest Bonus will be completely exhausted upon clearing the Dungeon Specchio. The more Rest Bonus you exhaust, the more Starlight you will earn.
However, Identità that have been swapped in or out during the Dungeon Specchio run will not spend their Rest Bonuses, and will not provide additional Starlight.
Identità that did not spend their Rest Bonuses, and Identità that were not swapped in or out will gain 1 Bar of Rest Bonus.
Entering the Dungeon Specchio
After finishing up the initial Team setup, press 'Confirm' to enter the Dungeon Specchio.
This area displays the additional Cost you have gained over the deployment process.
Exploring Dungeon Specchio
The Dungeon Specchio rooms and paths are randomly generated.
You proceed by moving to nodes adjacent to your current node. You may find various events or combat encounters in each of the nodes.
Cost
You will earn 'Cost' as you proceed through the Dungeon Specchio. 'Cost' you earned can be spent at Shops and Rest Stops.
Doni E.G.O
Acquired Doni E.G.O are displayed here. Doni E.G.O are items that offer powerful effects that last until the end of the Dungeon.
Effective Attacks
Below the combat Encounter nodes in Dungeon Specchio are types and affinities effective against the enemies in each node.
Sinner Status
The HP, SP, and lost lives of your Sinners will carry over between encounters.
Shops
At Shops, you can spend your 'Cost' to purchase Doni E.G.O, heal allies, deploy/swap out additional Identità or power up selected Identità.
At Shops, you can sell Doni E.G.O you don't use to obtain 'Cost'.
Rest Stops
At Rest Stops, you can spend your 'Cost' to heal allies, deploy/swap out additional Identità or enhance Doni E.G.O.
You can Fuse Doni E.G.O to obtain different Doni E.G.O.
Floor Buffs
Upon clearing a floor, you will obtain random enemy buffs tied to each Doni E.G.O.
Enemy Buffs will continue to stack with every floor cleared.
Dungeon Specchio Rewards
Upon clearing a Dungeon Specchio run, spend Moduli di Encefalina to claim your rewards.
The amount of rewards depends on the number of cleared Floors. You can use Weekly Bonus chances to claim even more rewards.
Miracle in District 20
Unlock Miracle in District 20
The [Miracle in District 20 Event Sezioni] opens after clearing Sezione 5-36 of the Main Story. You may enter the event page via the banner on the Window or the Driverside.
Event Period

The duration of The Miracle in District 20 event is shown here. During the event, you can earn [Trinkets Sack] by clearing Sezioni and Dungeons in the event and Main Story.
※ However, [Trinkets Sack] cannot be obtained in Luxcavations.
Event Encounters

Miracle in District 20 consists of 13 stages, including story stages.
Said stages also offer batches of [Trinkets Sack] as a first-time Clear bonus.
You can earn considerably more [Trinkets Sack] from the Miracle in District 20 stages compared to Main Story stages.
Event Bonus Units
Having E.G.O from the Miracle in District 20 event on your team increases the amount of [Trinkets Sack] earned from stages and dungeons.
Gift Exchange

You can redeem various rewards from the [Gift Exchange] based on the number of [Trinkets Sack] you have.
You can collect up to 4,000 [Trinkets Sack].
You can acquire event reward Identità e E.G.O, as well as various currencies from the [Gift Exchange].
The [Gift Exchange]'s open duration is shown here.
Event Sezioni
Miracle in District 20 does not feature a dungeon; instead, there's a special stage where you can earn larger amounts of Trinkets Sack. The special stage consumes Moduli di Encefalina.
Trinkets Sack
There is a small chance to obtain a Huge Trinkets Sack upon clearing an Encounter. Huge Trinkets Sacks are automatically converted to 20 Trinkets Sacks.
Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the Miracle in District 20 combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside - [Deviazione] and Theater - [Detour Tales].
The 2nd Walpurgis Night - The Dawn of Green
Unlocking The 2nd Walpurgis Night - The Dawn of Green
[The 2nd Walpurgis Night - The Dawn of Green] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.
Event Period

The duration of The 2nd Walpurgis Night - The Dawn of Green event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Normal and Hard difficulty Dawn of Green Ordeal Encounters and claim their rewards.
Normal Difficulty Encounter

Select the door to begin the Normal difficulty Dawn of Green Ordeal. Dawn of Green Ordeal consumes an Enkephalin Module upon completion. In Normal difficulty, any deployed Identità under Level 40 will be raised to Level 40. However, your Identità' current Uptie Tiers and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Hard Difficulty Encounter
Clearing the Normal difficulty Dawn of Green Ordeal unlocks the Hard difficulty. In Hard difficulty, your Identità' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.
Special Announcer
There will be a special, fixed Announcer for the Dawn of Green Ordeal Encounter. Therefore, you cannot select your own Announcers for this event Encounter.
Control Team Captain Effects

The #1 Sinner to be deployed in the Teams menu will be imbued with the 'Control Team Captain' effect. The Sinner with the 'Control Team Captain' effect will gain more Slots, their Skill composition will change, and will gain more beneficial effects.
Missions
You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.
You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.
Normal difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.
Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'The 2nd Walpurgis Night - The Dawn of Green' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
Refraction Railway Line 3
How to Enter
Select the activated Line to enter. Entering the Refraction Railway does not cost any currency or resources.
Creating your Team
You will choose a number of Identità e E.G.O to begin the expedition with.
Line 3 Stations
There are a total of 13 Stations in Refraction Railway Line 3. 10 of those Stations are combat Encounters.
Station #4, #8, and #12 are not combat Encounters. There, you can heal, revive, or change your Team Loadout.
Select the Station to enter.
Below each Station, you can view the rewards for clearing that Station. Claim them at the Lost & Found.
Team Setup
You can select up to 6 participants for an encounter. While you can select less than 6 combat participants, no additional Skill slots will be given for them throughout the encounter.
Encounter
Every battle in the Refraction Railway will allow you to directly match ally skills against enemy skills, just like in Focused Encounters.
Observation Logs

If you have already unlocked the Abnormalities' Observation Levels through the Story Dungeon Encounters, their Observation Levels will be reflected in the Refraction Railway and you can view their information as you would in those Dungeons.
However, the damage bonus based on Observation Levels do not apply in the Refraction Railway.
In Refraction Railway Line 3, the updated Observation Level will be saved even if you give up mid-Encounter.
The E.G.O resources held after clearing a Station can be carried over to the next Station.
Total Turns taken to clear the Station and Total Turns taken since the First Stop will be shown above each Station.
The HP, SP, and availability of your Identità are shown here.
Upon defeat, you can either return to the state immediately before entering that Station or continue using your surviving Identità.
Should you choose to continue, enemies' current HP will be saved. Their remaining HP percentages will be shown above the Station.
Select the Reset button to return to the state immediately before entering that Station.
Breaking Records

During an expedition, you can choose to start over from previously cleared Stations.
When you do so, the battle will start with the Sinners' statuses and E.G.O resources reverted to that point, and any progress you've made since that Station will be reset.
Rest Station
Station #4, #8, and #12 are Rest Stations. Reaching those Stations will fully heal all allies and revive dead Identità.
Identità with 0 or positive SP will maintain their SP, but Identità with negative SP will recover to 0 SP.
You can also change your Team Loadout in Rest Stations.
You cannot go back to the previous Station once you enter the Terminus. Choose carefully.
Clearing the Terminus is the ultimate objective of Refraction Railway Line 3.
Banner Requisites
You can check the requirements for acquiring Refraction Railway Line 3 banners here.
You can acquire more lavishly ornamented banners as you meet more difficult conditions.
Upon acquisition of these banners, the Total Turns of your best record will be displayed on them.
The Lost & Found
After clearing a Station in the Line for the first time, the rewards will be sent to the Lost & Found.

To gain access to a reward for the first time at Lost & Found, a number of Moduli di Encefalina will be required.
Afterward, you may freely access it and claim rewards you've earned at no additional cost.
Travel Collection
Upon clearing the final Station, your Refraction Railway play record will be saved. Up to 20 records can be viewed.
If you have more than 20 records, records with the highest Total Turns will be deleted first.

Timekilling Time
Refraction Railway Line 4
How to Enter
Select the activated Line to enter. Entering the Refraction Railway does not cost any currency or resources.
Refraction Railway presents a series of very challenging battles.
We recommend that you Uptie your Identità to Tier 4, level them to Level 45, and Threadspin your E.G.Os to Tier 4.
We suggest that you enter the Railway after meeting the recommended conditions.
Creating your Team
Choose a number of Identità e E.G.O to enter the Railway with.
If you level up, Uptie, or Threadspin your Identità o E.G.O outside the Refraction Railway, the changes will be applied to your characters in the Refraction Railway as well.
Line 4: Stations and Sections
Refraction Railway Line 4 is composed of several Sections that tie several Stations into a single Sezione. There are a total of 13 Stations.
There are four Combat Encounter Sezioni, each called a 'Section'; between each Section is a rest station.
Select the Section to enter.

Clearing the Section will record your Clear Turn Count.

Below the Clear Turn Count is the Total Turn Count, which is the sum of all Clear Turn Counts from each Section.
Below each Section, you can view the rewards for clearing that Section. Claim them at the Lost & Found.
Combat Deployment - Deployment Order Effects
Refraction Railway Line 4 presents special buffs to your Sinners depending on their order of Deployment.
Certain Backup units receive additional Entry SP buffs. Minus Coin Identità will receive negative Entry SP buffs.
Combat Deployment - Chain Battles

Refraction Railway Line 4 introduces the 'Chain Battle' system.

In Chain Battles, when a Deployed unit is defeated, the Backup units will fill their spots in their own Deployment orders.
You can enter the Section only when you have selected both your Deployment units and the Backup units, six in each category.
Encounter

Every battle in the Refraction Railway will allow you to directly match ally skills against enemy skills, just like in Focused Encounters.
In Refraction Railway Line 4, the Sapling of Light ability can be activated once per every run.
Activation inside the Refraction Railway does not count toward the activation limit outside the Refraction Railway.
Combat - Deployment Order Effects
You can view the Deployment Order effects in the middle of an Encounter as well.

In Line 4, a defeated ally Identity will give E.G.O resources that correspond with the Sin Affinities of the Attack Skills on the defeated Ally. The amount of E.G.O resources given corresponds with the Rank of each Attack Skill. (S1 gives 1, S2 gives 2, S3 gives 3, for example)
Combat - Chain Battles
When a Deployed unit is defeated, the Backup units will fill their spot in the Deployment order.

When a Backup unit is Deployed into battle, its Combat Passive activates instead of its Support Passive.

When a Deployed unit is defeated, its Support Passive will activate instead of its Combat Passive.
Combat - Resilient Determination
In Line 4, ally death will not lower the other allies' SP.
Certain enemies in Line 4 will gain certain effects based on their Deployment orders.
Observation Logs

If you have already unlocked the Abnormalities' Observation Levels through the Story Dungeon or Dungeon Specchio Encounters, their Observation Levels will be reflected in the Refraction Railway, and you can view their information as you would in those Dungeons.
However, the damage bonus based on Observation Levels does not apply in the Refraction Railway.
In Line 4, the updated Observation Level will be saved even if you give up or retry mid-Encounter.
The E.G.O resources held after clearing a Station can be carried over to the next Section.
The HP, SP, and availability of your Identità are shown at the bottom of the screen.
Rest Stations
Stopping by the Rest Stations, which are located between Sections, will fully heal your Identità and reset their Sp to 0.

You can also change your Team Loadout in Rest Stations.

If you are having difficulty clearing a Sezione, please note that a different Team may work better against certain enemies.
If all of your allies are defeated, you can choose between returning to the Team Loadout menu to change your Deployment orders, and immediately retrying the battle.
Breaking Records
During an expedition, you can choose to start over from previously cleared Sezioni.
When you do so, the battle will start with the Sinners' statuses and E.G.O resources reverted to that point, and any progress you've made since that Sezione will be reset.
Banner Requisites

Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the Murder on the WARP Express combat Encounters and view its story at any time at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
Chain Battles

In Chain Battles, you can deploy 'Backup Units' in addition to participating units.

When a unit is defeated mid-battle, a backup unit will substitute in to fill their place.

In Chain Battles, you cannot lose until all units selected for the Encounter(both participating units and backup units) are defeated.
Deploying Backup Units

When a participating unit is killed, Backup units will be substituted into the field in the order of their Deployment.

When the Backup units substitute into the battle, they enter with bonus SP based on the starting SP values defined by their deployment order.

Certain Chain Battles may give additional buffs for Backup units.

Please experiment with Deployment orders to strategize prior to entering Chain Battles.
Substitute

In Chain Battles, SP loss due to ally death listed in the 'Base factors increasing/decreasing Sanity' will not activate.

If an ally is defeated mid-Encounter, the Backup unit next in the Deployment order will replace them.
This is called <Substitution>.

When a Deployed unit is defeated, its Support Passive will activate instead of its Combat Passive.

When a Backup unit is substituted in, its Combat Passive will activate instead of its Support Passive.
Remaining Enemies Indicator

In Chain Battles, the indicator that shows the number of Waves shows total number of enemies and the number of defeated enemies instead.

However, this indicator does not take into account the extra enemies that are summoned due to certain conditions.

Refraction Railway Line 5
How to Enter
Select the activated Line to enter. Entering the Refraction Railway does not cost any currency or resources.
Refraction Railway presents a series of very challenging battles.
We recommend that you Uptie your Identità to Tier 4, level them to Level 50, and Threadspin your E.G.Os to Tier 4.
We suggest that you enter the Railway after meeting the recommended conditions.
Line 5: Stations and Sections
Refraction Railway Line 5 is composed of several Sections that tie several Stations into a single Sezione. There are a total of 11 Stations.
There are 3 Combat Encounter Sezioni, each called a 'Section'.
Entering Section

Clearing the Section will record your Clear Turn Count.

Below the Clear Turn Count is the Total Turn Count, which is the sum of all Clear Turn Counts from each Section.
Below each Section, you can view the rewards for clearing that Section. Claim them at the Lost & Found.
Combat Deployment - Chain Battles

Refraction Railway Line 5 uses the 'Chain Battle' system.

In Chain Battles, when a Deployed unit is defeated, the Backup units will fill their spots in their own Deployment orders.
You can enter the Section only when you have selected both your Deployment units and the Backup units, six in each category.
Identity Deployment Limits

In Line 5, you cannot use the same team to challenge both Section 1 and Section 2.
Each Section needs a different team of Identità.
This Identity restriction does not apply to Section 3, however, and you can freely select any Identity to be deployed.
Creating your Team
Choose a number of Identità e E.G.O to enter the Railway with.
If you level up, Uptie, or Threadspin your Identità o E.G.O outside the Refraction Railway, the changes will be applied to your characters in the Refraction Railway as well.

Backup units receive Starting SP buffs, and Backup units further back in the Deployment order receive greater Starting SP buffs.

Minus Coin Identità receive negative Starting SP buffs.
Combat

Every battle in the Refraction Railway will allow you to directly match ally skills against enemy skills.
The highest Turn Count that can be recorded in each Section is 100 Turns. If your Turn Count goes beyond 100 Turns in a single Sezione, the Encounter will end in defeat.
Observation Logs

Save for the Boss enemy of the final waves of each Section, all enemy info will be unlocked for viewing from the start. Prepare the appropriate strategy, Identity, and E.G.O loadout based on this information.
However, the damage bonus based on Observation Levels does not apply in the Refraction Railway.
In Line 5, the updated Observation Level will be saved even if you give up or retry mid-Encounter.
Combat - Chain Battles
When a Deployed unit is defeated, the Backup units will fill their spot in the Deployment order.

When a Backup unit is Deployed into battle, its Combat Passive activates instead of its Support Passive.

When a Deployed unit is defeated, its Support Passive will activate instead of its Combat Passive.
Combat - Lasting Determination

In Line 5, when an Identity is killed, they release E.G.O resources based on the ranks and Affinities of their Base Attack Skills. And just like in Chain Encounters, their deaths will not reduce other allies' SP.
Certain enemies in Line 5 will gain certain effects based on their Deployment orders.
Combat - Buffs & Trials
Clearing a wave(Station) within a Section will bring you to the Buffs & Trials selection menu.
Here, you will be selecting a mix of Buffs and Trials with positive effects for allies and enemies both. Any Buffs and Trials selected here will persist throughout Line 5.
Clear Info
After clearing each Section, you can view statistics such as the obtained Buffs, Trials, and participating Identità in the Clear Info menu.
The E.G.O resources held after clearing a Section can be carried over to the next Section.
If all of your allies are defeated, you can choose between returning to the Team Loadout menu to change your Deployment orders, and immediately retrying the battle.
Breaking Records
During an expedition, you can choose to start over from previously cleared Sezioni.
When you do so, the battle will start with the Sinners' statuses and E.G.O resources reverted to that point, and any progress you've made since that Sezione will be reset.
Banner Requisites
You can check the requirements for acquiring Refraction Railway Line 5 banners here.

Once you obtain a Banner, the Turn Count of your best record for each Section and total turns will be displayed on it.
Making a new best record in total turn count will update the Turn Count on your banner. If there are records with the same number of total turns, it will display the more recent record.
The Lost & Found
After clearing a Sezione in the Line for the first time, the rewards will be sent to the Lost & Found.

To gain access to a reward for the first time at Lost & Found, a number of Moduli di Encefalina will be required.
Afterward, you may freely access it and claim rewards you've earned at no additional cost.
Travel Collection
Upon clearing the final Sezione, your Refraction Railway play record will be saved. Up to 20 records can be viewed.
If you have more than 20 records, records with the highest Total Turns will be deleted first.
